    • 方法详细资料

      • postForIamToken

        public static AuthBean postForIamToken(java.lang.String iamUrl,
                                       java.lang.String bodyMessage)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get auth info from IAM service
        参数:
        iamUrl - the URL of IAM service
        bodyMessage - the body of message
        返回:
        AuthBean
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Failed to get IAM information, throw an exception

      • postForSmsMessage

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> postForSmsMessage(java.lang.String smnUrl,
                                                                                 java.lang.String bodyMessage,
                                                                                 java.lang.String projectId,
                                                                                 java.lang.String token)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        发送SMS短信信息
        参数:
        smnUrl - smn的URL地址
        bodyMessage - 消息内容
        projectId - 租户的项目ID
        token - 鉴权的token
        返回:
        Map 返回json格式的消息，包括messageId，RequestId
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - 发送短信失败，则抛出异常

      • setConnectTimeOut

        public static void setConnectTimeOut(int connectTimeOut)
        参数:
        connectTimeOut - the connectTimeOut to set

      • setSocketTimeOut

        public static void setSocketTimeOut(int socketTimeOut)
        参数:
        socketTimeOut - the socketTimeOut to set
